markdown.content:
for example B is Bê, D is Dê
Diacritics are also pretty fun and kinda recursive, hỏi has a hỏi in it, ngã has a ngã in it, nặng has a nặng in it (it's the dot below the a, not the thing above the a), huyền has a huyền in it (not the ^, the \ one), sắc has a sắc in it (not the V, the / one)
